mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION ( RECEIVER_ID, SENDER_ID, EVENT_TYPE, CONTENT, RELATED_URL ,IS_READ ) VALUES (#{receiverId}, #{senderId}, #{eventType}, #{contents}, #{relatedUrl},0)
mapper.select: SELECT id, SENDER_ID AS senderId, RECEIVER_ID AS receiverId, EVENT_TYPE AS eventType, CONTENT AS contents, RELATED_URL AS relatedUrl, IS_READ AS isRead, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{userId} AND ID = #{notificationId}

SELECT id, SENDER_ID AS senderId, RECEIVER_ID AS receiverId, EVENT_TYPE AS eventType, CONTENT AS contents, RELATED_URL AS relatedUrl, IS_READ AS isRead, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE CREATED_DATE < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM NOTIFICATION WHERE RECEIVER_ID = #{userId} AND IS_READ = 0 ) AS isExistUnReadNotification
